ComicInfo.Summary:
Hidden for a century, a terrible evil is awakened when movers unwittingly unearth a huge grandfather clock bound in chains. Drenched in magic, riddles, and mystery, the clock itself has gone mad. Abbie, Ichabod, and their companions must outwit its riddles and madness to free themselvesâ€”or be consumed. With a backup story by Noelle Stevenson (Lumberjanes).
